## 

```{r}
#| label: reading in packages
#| message: false

library(tidyverse) # gen use for cleaning wrangling
library(lterdatasampler) # package with ltr
library(devtools) # load devtols
devtools::install_github("an-bui/calecopal") # install calecopal themes
data(pie_crab) # extracting pie crab

```

```{r}
#| label: starting exploratory visualization
#| message: false

ggplot(data = pie_crab,# dataset to plot
       aes(x = latitude,# x axis is latitude y axis is crab size
           y = size,
           color = site)) + # color points by site
  geom_point() + # creating scatterplot
  theme_minimal() + # using a different theme
  scale_color_manual( # coloring sites with custom colors
    values = calecopal::cal_palette("superbloom2",
                                    n = 13,
                                    type = "continuous")
  )

```
